story_ch0064_00_rival_07_01000/2401_1201: Hey. Got a sec?
Ugh! You—
What’re you doing here?!

I need more people to join me. Will you lend
a hand?

There’s a selfish “evil” out there that’s trying to
control the world by overpowering others.

All it does is steal what’s precious to us, so I’m
going to destroy it.
Th-that Pokémon!
Of course, I’m not asking you to help me for free.

I’ll lend you Hoopa’s power in return.
How about it?
You serious, bro?
Wait. Why are you asking US to help you?
I thought you wanted to take down Team Break!

Because you all no longer have any goals
or beliefs.
What...?
An organization’s goals and beliefs...

They have the potential to create a different kind
of evil.
But you...

Your goal of taking down the PML was ruined,
and now your team lacks firm beliefs.

The most you’ve accomplished lately are pathetic
thefts when nobody’s looking.
Watch your mouth, you—

I’m just saying that you could accomplish something
bigger if you join me.
Wh-what do you think?
B-but if we have to battle other organizations...
I don’t want Team Break to end like this.

I’ll keep fighting, no matter who I have to join
forces with!
Nice.
I don’t hate how you think.
